revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #57 Jaboca |image = [[File:Jaboca.png]] |caption = The cluster of drupelets that make up this Berry pop rhythmically if the Berry is handled roughly. The sound of these Berries attracts wild Pokémon. |growtime = 9h 18m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |mutation = 0.03% |points = 2,800 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *40 bitter *10 sour }} '''Jaboca''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 600 points of bitter on the field. The [[Durin]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. Various [[Farming Setups]] using Jaboca can be found [[Farming Setups#Roaming Pokemon Farm Setup|here]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 12 mins || 2 hours 12 mins || 4 hours 36 mins || 9 hours 18 mins - 18 hours 36 mins |- ! Animation |

18 hours 36 mins || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 6 hours 12 mins -
12 hours 24 mins || 75 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 4 hours 8 mins -
8 hours 16 mins || 50 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Jaboca_Flow_Chart.png|250px]]
